title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. Additionally, the second row is also removed from the layout.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the second row should remain intact.
SR:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted.
3. Notice that the second row remains unchanged.
